title: Food and war
itunes:title: Food and war
itunes:subtitle: Rachel B Hermann describes how food and hunger played a critical role in the story of the American Revolution. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Rachel B Hermann talks about her recent book No Useless Mouth, which explores how food and hunger played a critical role in the story of the American Revolutionary era. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
